channel.title: Charting Alberta Covid
channel.description: Recent content on Charting Alberta Covid

item.title: Schools and Students
item.description: Covid-19 Cases in Youth Covid-19 Cases in Alberta Schools See Support our Students Alberta for the complete list of schools with Covid-19 cases. See Global News' Lauren Pullen reporting for more school VOC information.

item.title: Outbreaks
item.description: Current numbers of outbreaks by AHS Zone Calgary Zone 50 Edmonton Zone 31 South Zone 18 Central Zone 10 North Zone 25 Covid-19 outbreaks (not including schools, see below) current as of Fri, Apr 09, 2021. AHS data updated on Tuesdays and Fridays. Outbreak Charts Alberta Schools are not included on this map after January 18th, 2021 as the criteria for outbreaks in schools changed.

item.title: Variants of Concern
item.description: Active VOC cases 7910 290 VOC Percentage 52.4% 1.11% Total VOC cases 12154 705 Total VOC recovered 4202 413 Total deaths from VOC 42 2 VOC specimens screened 30370 1283 Covid-19 variants of concern data current as of Mon, Apr 12, 2021
